quote: I don't want a future, I want a present. To me this appears of greater value. You have a future only when you have no present, and when you have a present, you forget to even think about the future.
quote_letters: I DONT WANT A FUTURE I WANT A PRESENT TO ME THIS APPEARS OF GREATER VALUE YOU HAVE A FUTURE ONLY WHEN YOU HAVE NO PRESENT AND WHEN YOU HAVE A PRESENT YOU FORGET TO EVEN THINK ABOUT THE FUTURE
